overview: A hyper-colorful and saturated dive into the VHS aesthetic of the 1990's, '1-800-SUN-DETH' is a parody of the chatline commercials that dominated the era, with a twist: what if a religious cult used the medium to try and recruit unsuspecting callers looking for life advice?
tagline: Tired of your dead end job? Roommates got you feeling like you’ve gotta drop off the grid and live out of a van in the forest? The Divine Father feels your pain. And he’s here to answer your questions.
title: 1-800-SUN-DETH
